name: Brasher
description:
Brasher is a small game developed in 8h.

You play as someone with sunglasses (yes that's important) that beats up badies, that are actually just emojis. Well, your imagination should help you out. Think of Superhot or Hotline Miami or some other awesome game while playing this little time waster ;)

No seriously. I really love the game and would like to have some feedback, if you don't mind?
